title: I have a question.
body:
Excuse me riot... *clears throat* WERE YOU FUCKING HIGH WHILE MAKING CAMILLE OR WHAT?
That champ has by far: 
destroyed the lore of my favorite region (zaun)
destroyed the lore of one of my favorite champions *cough*viktor*cough*
destroyed any hope of wining a game when shes in the enemy team cause 
SHE IS ONE BIG FUCKING DASH
Nerf that shit like you nerfed kassadin,  this game has gone to shits cause you keep eating shit filled MUshrooms and decide to create a new dash. Shes not even worth called a champion shes just one BIG FUCKING DASH

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=CyberneticFrenzy,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0HlE4Oeo,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-30T23:09:40.030+0000)
> destroyed the lore of one of my favorite champions *cough*viktor*cough*


It seems you have missed the big red post that is stuck at the top of this boards section,that talks about how Viktor is not actually ok with the religious side of the glorious evolved...

>That champ has by far:
destroyed the lore of my favorite region (zaun)
destroyed the lore of one of my favorite champions coughviktorcough
destroyed any hope of wining a game when shes in the enemy team cause
SHE IS ONE BIG FUCKING DASH

When OP confuses the Piltover LU with Zauns; makes a premature judgement over a champ that has yet to receive his new LU and rants about gameplay in the board section dedicated to Story, Art & Sound. 

F**king bravo dude.
http://i.imgur.com/aTKmL1x.jpg
I guess Riots hyper champion dash obsession had to reach some pinnacle
I mean she's getting nerfed next patch.
